main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified objects in Waterloo, Iowa on September 17, 1955.
interesting points: One sighting involved an object that appeared as a star, alternating colors of white, red, and green, and was stationary before fading out., Another witness reported a disk-like object making a zigzag motion and disappearing into clouds., The sightings were reported by 3 witnesses and lasted for about 4 minutes., The objects were described to have flashing lights and were estimated to be 6-8 feet in diameter., The reliability of the reports is considered fair to good for that locality.
